homeComponent.p1: Venko training provides personalized routines and exercises that are updated every month.
homeComponent.p2: Users have different routines depending on their goals and physical capabilities.
homeComponent.logInText: Log in to access your personalized training.
homeComponent.p3: Or try some of our best targeted routines:
homeComponent.routineStrong: Improve your strength week by week.
homeComponent.routineBurn: Burn calories, increase your heart rate and improve your resistance.
homeComponent.routineMobility: Improve your flexibility and keep healthy joints.
homeComponent.routineByePunch: Improve your core strenght and train your abs.
